data.name: Idol Hands 2
data.detailed_description:
üíüCHECK THIS OUT!üíü

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1909270


About the Game

‚óÜStory:
You are an ace agent, but you are betrayed by your lover and the biggest female star, Xia Youqing, and have to start over.
You, who have a discerning eye, found two luminous rough stones in the vast crowd. One is Song Yunzhen, a beauty,
In addition to the super high value of classical beauty, she is also a creative talent.
The other is the exact opposite, a hot Taiwanese girl Rainie with dyed blond hair and trendy clothes.
With limited resources, you can only sign one of them to make them a generation of superstars, and the other unselected,
It will be signed off by the devil's predecessor, Xia Youqing, and will become your number one enemy.
Do your best to make your artist a legend!

‚óÜHow to play:
As a love simulation business development game, there will be a fixed number of action points every month to cultivate your artists.
In addition to taking jobs to improve the ability and popularity of artists, you can also spend money to nurture them.
When the ability is sufficient, you can receive various announcements, and accumulate money and fame more quickly.
There will be a variety of emergencies in the game, which will be based on the artist's ability and the random dice roll system.
Oriented to different developments, we strongly recommend that you go with the flow rather than constantly save&load,
Whatever you choose - we hope it will be a fun experience for you!
(This time, we'll cancel the damn mini-games and let you focus on the nurturing experience)

‚óÜGame Features
‚óáDouble heroine script, according to the heroine, there will be different story progression,
which will also affect the dialogue of other characters.
‚óáAnother heroine who is not selected will fight with you all the way as your old enemy.
‚óáMore than 20 sets of CG, live2d anamation.
‚óáThe female lead is fully dubbed in Chinese
‚óáThe mouse is operated with one hand, freeing your other hand, as for what you want to use it for, needless to say!
‚óáA pure love development game, which explains the protagonist's mental journey in great detail.
‚óáMultiple ending routes, classic gameplay simulation development game.
‚óáMultiple sets of clothing styles can be replaced.
‚óáCommunication system, cultivate friendship with all kinds of NPCs, they will become a help in the entertainment circle.

data.short_description: You, who have a discerning eye, found two luminous rough stones . One is Song Yunzhen, a beauty, In addition to the super high value of classical beauty, she is also a creative talent. The other is the exact opposite, a hot Taiwanese girl Rainie with dyed blond hair and trendy clothes.
data.supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 / AMD Radeon HD 6870 DirectX ÁâàÊú¨: 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon HD 6870 DirectX ÁâàÊú¨: 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, All characters are over 20 years old.
